whyUs.title: Why choose Happy Booth?
whyUs.subtitle: Our commitment: making your event an unforgettable moment

feature1.title: Installation included
feature1.description: Our team takes care of everything: delivery, installation and pickup of your photobooth.

feature2.title: Professional entertainment
feature2.description: An experienced host accompanies your guests for successful photos and guaranteed atmosphere.

feature3.title: Private online gallery
feature3.description: All your photos are available on a private gallery accessible for 30 days after the event.

feature4.title: Unlimited prints
feature4.description: Your guests leave with their photos printed instantly. No limits, just happiness!

howItWorks.title: How does it work?
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple process for a successful event

step1.title: 1. Quote request
step1.description: Contact us with your event details to receive a personalized quote.

step2.title: 2. Confirmed booking
step2.description: Once the quote is validated, we confirm your booking and prepare your photobooth.

step3.title: 3. Installation on the day
step3.description: Our team arrives 1 hour before the event to install and test the equipment.

step4.title: 4. Entertainment and fun!
step4.description: Your host accompanies your guests throughout the event for successful photos.

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking at least 2 months in advance, especially for events during high season (May to September). However, don't hesitate to contact us even for last-minute requests!

items.question: What happens in case of technical problems?
items.answer: Our hosts are trained to solve most technical problems. In case of major breakdown, we have backup equipment and a technical hotline available 24/7.

items.question: Are prints really unlimited?
items.answer: Yes! Your guests can take as many photos as they want and all are printed instantly. It's included in the price, no extra charge.

items.question: Can we customize the photo design?
items.answer: Absolutely! We create a custom design with your colors, your logo or your names. You receive a preview before the event for validation.

items.question: How much space is needed?
items.answer: For a classic photobooth, plan about 3x3 meters. For the 360 Booth, count 4x4 meters. We adapt to your available space.

items.question: Are there travel fees?
items.answer: Travel fees are included within a 50km radius around Paris. Beyond that, a supplement will be applied according to distance.
